message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor to start.  This gives us both a good chunk of money.
Fair is fair Alice, how about a 55/45 split in my favor this time?  We are on the clock after all.
Okay Bob, let's be realistic. I'll come down a bit to 52/48.  We're losing money with every round!
Time is running out Alice, and that money is shrinking fast. I'll take a slight edge with 51/49.  Let's close this out!
